Package biocode.fims.bcid

The BCID package contains the core components of the BCID system, including minting, creation, and working with elements and groups in the BCID system

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Encoder
    Encoders interface defines the methods and fields that the various encoders need to implement
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bcid
    The Bcid class encapsulates all of the information we know about a BCID.
    BcidDatabase
    Creates the connection for the backend Bcid Database.
    BcidEncoder
    The purpsose of the BcidEncoder is to encode very short identifiers for EZID shoulders to represent unique bcids.
    BcidMetadataSchema
    Metadata Schema for Describing a Bcid-- These are the metadata elements building blocks that we can use to express this Bcid either via RDF or HTML and consequently forms the basis of what the "outside" world sees about the bcids.
    BcidMinter
    This class mints shoulders for use in the EZID systems known as data groups.
    CheckDigit
    The Check Digit algorithm is adapted from http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luhn_mod_N_algorithm
    Database
    abstract class to hold basic Database methods
    ExpeditionMinter
    Mint new expeditions.
    Ezid
    Represent an ezid Bcid in our system
    InputFileParser
    Parse an input File and construct an element Iterator which can be fetched
    ManageEZID
    Class to work with EZID creation from the Bcid Database.
    ProjectMinter
    Mint new expeditions.
    Resolver
    Resolves any incoming Bcid to the BCID and/or EZID systems.
    ResourceType
    Components used to describe individual resource types.
    ResourceTypes
    ResourceTypes class is a controlled list of available ResourceTypes.
    UserMinter
    Class to manage user creation and profile information.

Package biocode.fims.bcid Description

The BCID package contains the core components of the BCID system, including minting, creation, and working with elements and groups in the BCID system
